ygData.subject: Re: other goodies? **possible spoiler**
ygData.msgSnippet: oh I know he is not a gnome... but I have never killed him so I don t know what he has...  I was just referring to the necromancer post that was a reply to the
ygData.messageBody:
oh I know he is not a gnome... but I have never killed him so I don't know
what he has... I was just referring to the necromancer post that was a
reply to the gnome post...

Rutreeii

----- Original Message -----
From: John Cuyle <johncuyle@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, May 07, 1999 12:21 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] other goodies? **possible spoiler**


> From: "John Cuyle" <johncuyle@...>
>
> Tovax is not a gnome and he doesn't carry a black robe. The only black
robe
> I have heard of is found in najena.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Jay Hollums <jhollums@...>
> To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 7:07 AM
> Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] other goodies? **possible spoiler**
>
>
> > From: "Jay Hollums" <jhollums@...>
> >
> > You speak of Tovax... He is a evil little b...... I plan on getting a
> party
> > together soon and taking him out... (cazic-thul server) If you or any
one
> > wants to be part of this, I plan, as of now, to do him in on Monday of
> next
> > week at about 9:30pm est.
> >
> > Rutreeii
> >
> > p.s. I would be happy to do it sooner if I can get a party together
sooner
> > that will be willing to beat his sorry (bony) ass....(er skeleton
> *chuckle*)
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----

15th

me
> > > indifferently then attack me with disease clouds. I did nothing
> agressive
> > > to it...just walked by it. Anyway, i never killed it but saw it at
the
> > zone
> > > entrance from karana.
> > >
> > > Ill look again for him...this time I will have no mercy for him!

NPC
